com.pump.swing

Interface JBreadCrumb.BreadCrumbFormatter<T>

  • Enclosing class:
    JBreadCrumb<T>

    public static interface JBreadCrumb.BreadCrumbFormatter<T>
    Each bread crumb is represented by a JLabel, and this gives you the opportunity to format that label. For example, if this component navigated java.io.Files, then you should apply a BreadCrumbFormatter that invoked label.setText(file.getName()) and label.setIcon(fileIcon).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void format(JBreadCrumb<T> container, javax.swing.JLabel label, T pathNode, int index)
      Format a label to accommodate the path node (crumb) provided.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        void format(JBreadCrumb<T> container,
            javax.swing.JLabel label,
            T pathNode,
            int index)
        Format a label to accommodate the path node (crumb) provided.

        For example: this might add specific icons, or change the font or opacity based on what this label is representing.

        Parameters:
        container - the JBreadCrumb this is part of.
        label - the label to be formatted.
        pathNode - the node/crumb being represented.
        index - the index of this node in the path.
